plot: Mediocre and poor poet Hamazasp is tempted by the Devil. He tastes all that the money and fame could bring but loses moral ground. The perfect portraying of transitional politicians...
title: Khatabalada
plot_es: Mediocre and poor poet Hamazasp is tempted by the Devil. He tastes all that the money and fame could bring but loses moral ground. The perfect portraying of transitional politicians...
